name: Giant Alien Spaceship – A Modern Air Combat to Save Mother Earth From Pollution
name_original: Giant Alien Spaceship – A Modern Air Combat to Save Mother Earth From Pollution
description:
ALIEN SPACESHIP WAR is a mobile game about the invasion on the earth, where the two alien groups from the space have attacked the earth with their dangerous spaceship and helicopter. The environmental issues on the earth have triggered their attention as industrial pollutants are damaging environments on other planets as well.

You are a hero of alien army and determine to win this war against humans, so you can introduce and implement proper procedures and protocols to reduce harmful emissions, which are the main root cause of pollution on other planets.

Play and enjoy ALIEN SPACESHIP WAR, be watchful for the obstacles and powerful jets and space aircraft that will take you out. Collect coins to increase the points and unlock more powerful fighter jet. You can collect bonus missile, which is more dangerous for enemy aircraft, by completing each wave. There are four space missions and at the end of every mission, you have to destroy the powerful and dangerous commander of the enemy army. Save your bonus missile and space rocket to destroy the stronger and powerful commander.

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for more interesting and addictive games.
